DOC.brief_summary: The study undertaken investigate urethral microtrauma , cause intermittent catheterization , differs three hydrophilic catheter intermittent catheterization , LoFric ; SpeediCath ( SC ) SpeediCath Compact Male ( SCCM ) . The study prospective , randomised , cross-over , single-centre study . Each subject randomize use three different catheter type . Three catheterization perform catheter type one day , least two hour catheterization . The washout period catheter switch least one week . The primary objective evaluate urethral microtrauma three hydrophilic catheter regard hematuria intermittent catheterization . The secondary objective evaluate urethral microtrauma three hydrophilic catheter regard pyuria subjective evaluation intermittent catheterization . The safety three catheter evaluate term adverse advent , non-serious serious , rat causality . The hypothesis level hematuria equal use different catheter test use Wilcoxon sign rank test . The hypothesis reject p-value less 5 % .
